= T-REX in the Scheme of Things =
The block diagrams below depict common  architectural patterns for autonomous robots. In all cases, there has been a de-facto agreement on the use of modular task specific components variously called behaviors, actions, commands or skills. The approaches differ primarily in how such primitives are composed to achieve more sophisticated tasks.
